00033 MTKt_status MtkLatLonToLS(
00034   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo, 
00035   double lat_dd,        
00036   double lon_dd,        
00037   float *line,          
00038   float *sample          )
00039 {
00040   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00041   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00042   double som_x;                 /* SOM X */
00043   double som_y;                 /* SOM Y */
00044 
00045   if (line == NULL || sample == NULL)
00046     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00047 
00048   status = MtkLatLonToSomXY(mapinfo.path, lat_dd, lon_dd, &som_x, &som_y);
00049   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00050 
00051   status = MtkSomXYToLS(mapinfo, som_x, som_y, line, sample);
00052   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00053 
00054   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00055 
00056 ERROR_HANDLE:
00057   if (status_code != MTK_NULLPTR) {
00058     *line = -1.0;
00059     *sample = -1.0;
00060   }
00061   return status_code;
00062 }
